# size

**Instance Property**

The logical dimensions, in points, for the image.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

This value reflects the logical size of the image and takes the image’s current orientation into account. Multiply the size values by the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/scale] property to get the pixel dimensions of the image.

## Getting the image size and scale

- **scale**: The scale factor of the image.
